description: A statue will honour Solitude, a black woman involved in a 1802 uprising in the French West Indies.
title: France racism: Paris to commemorate slave rebellion figure
title_page: France racism: Paris to commemorate slave rebellion figure - BBC News
maintext: She was sentenced to death, the history notes, but allowed to give birth before being "tortured" - an ambiguous term which could mean she was indeed put to death, through flogging for example.
